doc.name: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974
doc.citation: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974

chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Income Tax (Dividends, Interest
         and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974.

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement [see Note 1]
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974 > Section 2
chunks.text:
This Act shall come into operation on the day on which it
         receives the Royal Assent.

chunks.title: Section 4 - Definition
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974 > Section 4
chunks.text:
In this Act, the Assessment Act means the Income Tax Assessment
         Act 1936.

chunks.title: Section 5 - Incorporation
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974 > Section 5
chunks.text:
The Assessment Act is incorporated and shall be read as one
         with this Act.

chunks.title: Section 6 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974 > Section 6
chunks.text:
The tax known as income tax, to the extent that that tax is
         payable in accordance with sectionÂ 128B of the Assessment Act, is
         imposed on income to which that section applies.

chunks.title: Section 7 - Rates of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Dividends, Interest and Royalties Withholding Tax) Act 1974 > Section 7
chunks.text:
The rates of income tax imposed by this Act are:
      (a)   in respect of income to which subsection 128B(4) of the
             Assessment Act appliesâ30%; and
      (b)   in respect of income to which subsectionÂ (5) of that section
             appliesâ10%; and
      (c)   in respect of income to which subsectionÂ (5A) of that section
             appliesâ30%.
